name: OSINT – Pattern of Life (Multi-Mission)
description: Cross-mission OSINT-based pattern of life for one or more focal entities.

sections.title: Collection Summary
sections.purpose: Summarize OSINT coverage by mission and entity.
sections.prompt: Summarize OSINT collection volume and mission coverage, highlighting how many relevant reports exist per mission and any major gaps.

sections.title: Identity Overview
sections.purpose: Describe focal entity identity, aliases, affiliations.
sections.prompt: Describe the focal entity's identity, aliases, affiliations, and online presence using OSINT documents and the entity graph. Call out any unresolved questions.

sections.title: Pattern of Life
sections.purpose: Explain routines, key locations, temporal patterns.
sections.prompt: Describe routines, recurring locations, temporal patterns, and notable behavioral triggers across missions. Highlight consistencies and deviations.

sections.title: Online Infrastructure
sections.prompt: List known websites, platforms, handles, or infrastructure linked to the focal entities, including how they interrelate.

sections.title: Gaps and Collection Needs
sections.prompt: Using gap-analysis JSON and OSINT sources, highlight missing coverage, weak sources, and high-value unknowns requiring collection.

sections.title: Recommended Actions
sections.prompt: Recommend OSINT next steps (collection, alerts, deconfliction) grounded in the evidence above.

name: GEOINT – Area Overview
description: Summarizes terrain, infrastructure, and activity patterns within an Area of Interest.

sections.title: Area of Interest Description
sections.prompt: Describe the AOI: terrain, infrastructure, key terrain, and lines of communication using mission context and datasets.

sections.title: Activity Overview
sections.prompt: Summarize observed activity patterns across missions in this AOI, noting trends or surges.

sections.title: Critical Infrastructure
sections.prompt: Identify and describe critical infrastructure nodes (bridges, comms, facilities) present in the AOI and their relevance.

sections.title: Movement Patterns
sections.purpose: Explain movement routes and choke points.
sections.prompt: Describe known movement routes, choke points, and typical flows derived from events and datasets.

sections.title: Geospatial Gaps
sections.prompt: Use coverage and gap data to identify blind spots in GEOINT collection or spatial understanding.

sections.title: GEOINT Recommendations
sections.prompt: Recommend GEOINT-focused next steps (imagery tasking, patrol routes, sensor placement).

name: SIGINT – Traffic Characterization
description: Characterizes signal behavior and anomalies for a given mission.

sections.title: Signal Environment Overview
sections.prompt: Summarize the RF environment (bands, densities, typical emitters) observed in this mission.

sections.title: Traffic Patterns
sections.prompt: Describe recurring signal patterns, bursts, and diurnal trends, calling out notable correlations.

sections.title: Anomalies & Outliers
sections.prompt: Highlight unusual signals, timing anomalies, or protocol deviations that merit attention.

sections.title: Potential Vulnerabilities
sections.prompt: Using semantic profiles and any known CVE/ATT&CK mappings, identify exploitable weaknesses or critical dependencies (without suggesting illegal action).

sections.title: SIGINT Gaps
sections.prompt: Identify gaps in frequency, time, or emitter coverage using datasets and the gap analysis JSON.

sections.title: Recommended SIGINT Actions
sections.prompt: Suggest SIGINT-focused next steps (taskings, sensor placements, protocol-focused analysis).

name: HUMINT – Debrief & Cross-Corroboration
description: Summarizes HUMINT reporting, cross-checks other disciplines, and flags gaps.

sections.title: Source Summary
sections.prompt: Summarize HUMINT sources without PII: number of sources, general access, reporting history, and overall tone.

sections.title: Key Reporting
sections.prompt: Summarize the most significant HUMINT reports and their main claims, noting timing and context.

sections.title: Cross-Corroboration
sections.purpose: Compare HUMINT claims with other intel.
sections.prompt: Compare HUMINT claims to OSINT/SIGINT/GEOINT and indicate where claims are corroborated, partially corroborated, or contradicted.

sections.title: Credibility Assessment
sections.prompt: Provide a structured assessment of source/report credibility and consistency, including caveats or confidence statements.

sections.title: HUMINT Gaps & Needs
sections.prompt: Identify HUMINT questions that remain unanswered and where more access is needed.

sections.title: Recommended HUMINT Actions
sections.prompt: Propose HUMINT requirements, debrief lines, or coordination points to pursue next.
